title: Learning Portal
description: An ed tech platform where admin can add, remove or edit videos, assignments and quizzes and students can watch videos, attempt quizzes and submit assignments and can see the leaderboard.

title: Cars Arena
description: A car spare parts manufacturer company website where user can buy spare parts in retail price. Here admin can add new product and can confirm someone's order after the payment is confirmed.

title: Byteware
description: A warehouse management system where user can add, remove or edit products from the server. User can also deliver products and track the sales overview. To perform all the tasks, user must be logged in to our database.

title: Aumi Tuition Care
description: A tutor's website where user can find the tutor's service packages and can checkout with any of the package they want. To checkout user must be logged in to the server

title: Review Hub
description: A website where user can find reviews about Xbox Series X and also can see their revenue data.
